name: AI & Machine Learning
description: Explore the frontiers of artificial intelligence, data science, and machine learning algorithms.

captain.name: AI Captain
captain.message: Let's innovate with data. Contact me for AI/ML collaborations!

longDescription: The AI & ML sub-community focuses on practical applications of machine learning. We cover topics from basic regression to deep learning and natural language processing. We encourage members to work on real-world datasets and participate in hackathons.
vision: Identifying and solving local problems using data-driven approaches.
